name: Deer At The Table
description:
What is it?

There is a DEER at the table, sitting in front of you. Who is he? a deer! Does he have a secret? of course! Is he dangerous and can kill you? Yes.

A short point-and-click VHS horror game.

Gameplay

Discover the deer's secret, and find all possible endings (more than 1 of course)

Attention

The game has jumpscares, flashing images and loud sounds.

Developer

Game made by Daniel Oschepkov (Serious Duck Studios)

Credits

Some models (furniture models) and sounds are taken from SKETCHFAB (models), TUNETANK (music) and ZVUKIPRO (sounds)
